channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Los Angeles wildfires burn thousands of homes and other structures
item.description: A fast-moving fire has broken out in the Hollywood Hills about a mile from the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

item.title: Paris Hilton and Adam Brody among celebrities to lose homes in wildfires
item.description: Actor James Woods breaks down in tears on live TV as he describes how his Pacific Palisades property was razed.

item.title: Hollywood Hills blaze rapidly expanding, fire chief says
item.description: California fire chief David Acuna told the BBC there had been "zero progress" in containing the fires because of high winds and dry conditions.

item.title: Chad foils attempt to destabilise country - minister

item.title: U.S. stock markets close to honor former President Jimmy Carter
item.description: The New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq will both observe Thursday's national day of mourning in a Wall Street tradition dating back to 1865.

item.title: Russia keeping close eye on Trump's claim to Greenland
